item.title: Two Apps - One Action
item.description: A little while ago I wrote about a Shortcut that I used to lay out images of Scrabble tiles 1 in FreeForm to help solve anagrams. As part of that post I said: I then looked at doing it in Keyboard Maestro but I couldnâ€™t seem to find a way to iterate over each character in a string.

item.title: The frameworks are crazy
item.description: I had a break from programming for a bit more than a decade. Prior to that I used to build CMS solutions and do multimedia programming in Director 1. One of my favourite things to do was to build automation workflows and development frameworks. When I was working at Bayleaf Software in Vancouver I developed a framework for our ColdFusion coding projects and also build some tools in VTML which was a markup language that the ColdFusion Studio IDE 2 used.
